bug.author: mouradmourafiq
bug.summary: Polyaxon tensorboard stop does not work when the pod is not scheduled
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
If the pod is not schedulable, either for resources reasons or if the image is not found, the user will not be able to stop/delete the tensorboard using polyaxon CLI or UI. <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
It should work very similar to other primitives.
